title: Ryoukai Shinpan
description:
Description :
        A village where huge body parts fall from the sky.A phenomenon where, after death, internal organs that should be inside the body completely vanish. People who continue to dream of immortality. Katagishi belongs to the Ryoukai Shinpan Special Investigation Division who deal with these unexplained phenomena that are beyond human knowledge. What is the real truth that he is pursuing...?
